perms.choose: Please mention user/role or type a role name!

shuffle.oneSongs: **You only have one song in the queue!**

addserver.url: Pelase enter a valid dsicord invite URL
addserver.noargs: Please include an ID or invite link

addadmin.noargs: :x: Please include an ID or mention
addadmin.add: has been added as admin to this bot!

deladmin.noargs: :x: Please include an ID or mention
deladmin.already2: already not admin in this bot
deladmin.delete: has been removed from this bot!

connect.noOtherBot: You don't have any other bot in this server
connect.botlen: Are you sure you want to apply this bot settings to another **[B.len]** bots ? type **yes** to confirm.
connect.change: Settings has been changed for your another **[B.len]** bots.

textToggle.channelsList: This channel's is/are denied by admins
textToggle.channelRemoved: `[channelName]` has been removed from denied channels!
textToggle.channelAdded: `[channelName]` has been added to denied channels!

topMusic.topTitleGlobal: Top [count] played music in Lyra cloud bots

move.one: There's only one song in queue

share.noArgs: Please enter playlist name to share it link!
share.lockNoArgs: Please enter playlist name to lock it!

create.noName: Please enter playlist name with command!
create.exist: You can't have playlists with the same name!
create.long: Playlist name length must be less than 32 character!

import.checkArgs: Please enter playlist name and Lyra playlist link with command!
import.checkLink: include a valid Lyra playlist link after playlist's name!
import.sameAuthor: You can't import a playlist you have made!??

add.checkArgs: Please enter playlist name and link or type [queue] with command to add it!
add.botNotInVoice: **The bot is not in voice channel and it's not playing any thing**
add.nothingInQueue: **You don't have any thing you have queued in this queue!**
add.duplicateManyQueue: All videos in this queue are already in this playlist
add.addedManyQueue: I have added [`{0}`] video's to [{1}] from this queue.
add.notSupported: We support only YouTube for playlists links.
add.checkLink: include a valid link or [queue] after playlist's name!.
add.duplicate: This video already in this playlist!.
add.stream: You can't add streaming links to playlist!.
add.duplicateMany: All videos in [`{0}`] are already in this playlist.
add.addedMany: I have added [`{0}`] video's to [{1}] from [{2}].

delete.noArgs: Please enter playlist name with command!

play.noArgs: Please enter playlist name with command!
play.playing: :fire: {0} video's added to queue from [`{1}`] playlist

help.add: add [playlist name] YT url | to add something to your playlist
help.share: share | to make your playlist public
help.delete: del [playlist name] | to delete the playlist
help.lock: lock [playlist name] | to make your playlist private
help.import: import [playlist name] lyra playlist link | to transfer the song's to your playlist
